parameter_name_no_underscore_at_end.description: Parameter names shall not end with an underscore.

parameter_name_no_consecutive_underscore.description: Parameter names shall not contain consecutive underscores.

parameter_name_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Parameter names shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

parameter_name_max_length.description: Parameter name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
